      • parse

        public static java.util.Date parse(java.lang.String pattern,
                   java.lang.String strDateTime)
        Parses a string to produce a Date.
        参数:
        pattern - - the pattern of the string
        strDateTime - - the string to be parsed
        返回:
        A Date parsed from the string. In case of error, returns null.
